title: Sovryn and bringing DeFi to Bitcoin with Edan Yago: Episode 13
description:
Will Clemente and Edan Yago discuss Sovryn bringing DeFi to Bitcoin, tradeoffs of DeFi on Bitcoin versus other protocols, and more for our weekly interview Podcast/YouTube channel series. Can now find our podcast on Spotify, Apple, and Google Podcasts as well!  


Sam's twitter: twitter.com/EdanYago
dc:creator: Joe Burnett
